thread.title: CeeLo Green Debuts Gold Alter Ego at 2017 Grammys and the Internet Responds Accordingly
thread.title_full: CeeLo Green Debuts Gold Alter Ego at 2017 Grammys and the Internet Responds Accordingly

title: CeeLo Green Debuts Gold Alter Ego at 2017 Grammys and the Internet Responds Accordingly
text:
CeeLo Green Debuts Gold Alter Ego at 2017 Grammys and the Internet Responds Accordingly By E! News 
CeeLo Green is back and he's....gold! 
On Sunday, he made a surprise appearance on the red carpet at the 2017 Grammys while decked in gold from head to toe—he sported a golden full-length tunic and a golden mask. 
He arrived on a motorcycle with a group bikers. He walked the red carpet, posed for photos and mugged the E! News camera for a bit before speeding off in a yes, a Batmobile. But not before flipping the bird. Twice. 
Naturally, the Internet was full of jokes. Read 
Grammy Awards 2017 Winners: The Complete List E! News 
Some people pondered whether he came dressed like an actual Grammy—even though the trophy is a gramophone, not a statuette—while others wondered if he thought that going gold was his way of trying to win one. Feb 12, 2017 at 4:03pm PST Frazer Harrison/Getty Images — Marissa Bottaro (@MarissaSB00) February 13, 2017 Cee Lo Green's Logic Is If He Dresses Gold He Might Win A Grammy ???? pic.twitter.com/s0xF96iYpA — Mrs. Officer (@Z_h_a_v_e_y) February 13, 2017 
Others made some interesting comparisons. Why does Cee Lo Green look like a gold plated version of Shoney's Big Boy #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/goXWxXBKBB — Veronica Carrington (@TanyaMiecy) February 13, 2017 ceelo looks like he saw katy perry's outfit and refused to be one-upped. — Jackson Langford (@jacksonlangford) February 13, 2017 but still looks like Ceelo. Shit's wild. https://t.co/M319Id1Efl
